column4: got a problem with irssi. i'm running feisty fawn...and for some odd reason, when i start irssi, it tries to connect to a server which isn't to be found in the .irss/config file. can anyone help me??
i know, but it isn't listed there either.
yo might just compile and install irssi to /home/user/local/bin  then add that path to the begining of $PATH
